titleStmt.title: Reasons for the continuance of the common assurance of land by fines

notesStmt.note: Copy cataloged has annotations: "1558"; "you will find a generall affirmation of all matters in that noe man will lend money upon land or purchase land if they be prohibited the com[m]on assuranse of the law of the nation"; "This is written by Lord President Bradshawe [?].".
